title: Day 11: The Sacrifice of Isaac (2022)
author: Ascension

itunes:subtitle: Fr. Mike explains the significance behind sacrifice of Isaac, and why God chose to test Abraham as he reads Genesis 22-23, Job 11-12, and Proverbs 2:9:15.
